title: User-Friendly Installation and Setup – Guided Setup Through Voice Prompts
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want a guided setup process through voice prompts so that I can easily install and configure ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Voice-Based Shortcuts for Medication Reminders
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to use simple voice commands to set and manage my medication reminders so that I can efficiently keep track of my health without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User-Controlled Data Privacy and Consent Management
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to have control over my data sharing preferences so that I can feel secure about my privacy while using ALFRED.

title: Comprehensive Device Integration for Health Monitoring
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health-monitoring devices so that I can easily track my health and receive medication reminders without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Personalized User Experience for Health Management
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want the ALFRED system to learn my preferences for health monitoring and medication reminders so that I can manage my health efficiently without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Cognitive Support Tools for Memory Aids
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want cognitive support tools that help me remember my medication schedule and important tasks so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence at home.

title: Access to Help Desk Through Voice Commands
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to easily access a help desk through voice commands so that I can get assistance without feeling overwhelmed by technology.
